data.title: King Boris III of Bulgaria with wife Giovanna de Savoie
meta_keywords: king boris iii bulgaria wife giovanna savoie
data.meta_description: Prints of King Boris III of Bulgaria (1894-1943) (reigned 1918-1943) pictured with wife Giovanna de Savoie
data.text:
King Boris III of Bulgaria (1894-1943) (reigned 1918-1943) pictured with wife Giovanna de Savoie (daughter of Victor Emmanuel III of Italy) (1907-2000) Date: circa 1920s. Mary Evans Picture Library makes available wonderful images created for people to enjoy over the centuries. Â© Mary Evans / Grenville Collins Postcard Collection

Media ID 14405965

Boris Bulgaria Giovanna Royals Savoie Sep16 Thrown

Framed Prints

Add a touch of royal history to your home decor with our exquisite Framed Print from Media Storehouse. Featuring an elegant image of King Boris III of Bulgaria (1894-1943) and his graceful wife, Giovanna de Savoie (1907-2000), this captivating print is sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online. Dating back to the 1920s, this rights-managed photograph showcases the regal couple in a rare and intimate moment, making it a stunning addition to any room. Bring the history and elegance of the past into your present with our beautifully crafted Framed Print.

Add a touch of historical elegance to your home or office with this stunning photographic print of King Boris III of Bulgaria and his wife, Giovanna de Savoie. This exquisite image, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, captures the royal couple in the 1920s, with Boris III dressed in his regal attire and Giovanna gracefully by his side. This rights-managed print, featuring the charismatic King Boris III and his beautiful Italian wife, is a must-have for history enthusiasts and art collectors alike. Bring a piece of the past into your present with this beautiful, high-quality print.
